## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000                                  |
| Rationale                         | This order size, combined with current stock, ensures sufficient coverage for the forecasted demand over the next 5 days while accounting for a potential variability in sales and the 1-day lead time. It also allows for a buffer in case of unexpected surges in demand.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size is 5,000 units higher than the player's planned order quantity. This adjustment aims to reduce the risk of stockouts and improve the likelihood of meeting all demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.5 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6 days                                    |
| Comments                          | This order size avoids the minimum purchase quantity threshold for the discount, however, it optimizes stock levels for demand coverage. |
